ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This particular thread had to do with the experience loss on death. -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Lange, Stephen wrote:
>
> >Yeah, but the death penalties are there only to provide a
> >counter to the positive reinforcement you get (experience,
> >loot) for killing things in stupid ways that involve you dying
> >several times. So we're not putting in negative reinforcement
> >just because, we're doing it to turn a positive reinforcement
> >for an "improper" activity into a negative reinforcement.
>
> But only for those who cant bind. For the others they get to die and be
> positively reinforced.

This particular thread had to do with the experience loss on
death.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
